title: Brick Lane - its characterization of Chanu conveys

content.question: In its characterization of Chanu, the passage conveys the

choices.label: pathetic nature of his inability to see the world as it really is
cruelty that motivates his seeming benevolence
difficulty he has communicating with others

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
